GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-foundation-toolkit

Cloud Foundation Toolkit—code templates and tools for building and managing Google Cloud resources with Terraform

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Remote Desktop and SSH client for Google Cloud VMs
  • Terragrunt for Terraform management
  • Notebooks and code samples for building generative AI apps on Google Cloud
  • Terminal interface for managing Google Cloud instances
  • Automatically tags Terraform and OpenTofu resources
  • connects IaC tools like Terraform with GitOps for Kubernetes cluster management
  • Production-ready GenAI agent templates for Google Cloud with deployment, CLI, and monitoring tools
  • Lists resources for open source projects
  • OpenTofu is an open source tool that lets you manage and version your cloud infrastructure as code
